item.title: OnePlus 13 vs iPhone 16 Plus: Which premium phone wins? - The Indian Express
item.description:
OnePlus 13 vs iPhone 16 Plus: Which premium phone wins?

Date: October 2023 | Source: Indian Express

The comparison between OnePlus 13 and iPhone 16 Plus highlights significant differences in design, performance, and software capabilities, leading to varying user preferences.

  • The iPhone 16 Plus features a frosted glass back and a 6.7-inch OLED screen with 60Hz refresh rate.
  • OnePlus 13 offers a faux leather or glass finish, a slightly larger 6.82-inch AMOLED screen with 120Hz refresh rate, and IP69 water resistance.
  • In terms of software, iOS 18 offers extensive AI features, whereas OnePlus’s OxygenOS 15 provides customizable options.
  • Camera-wise, OnePlus 13 has a superior triple camera setup compared to the dual camera on the iPhone 16 Plus.
  • Battery performance favors OnePlus 13 with a 6,000mAh capacity compared to iPhone's lower capacity and slower charging.
“The OnePlus 13 is the clear winner with its smoother screen, bigger battery, more capable camera system, and open-sourced customisable operating system.”

Ultimately, the decision between the two devices depends on individual preferences regarding operating systems and desired features.

item.title: Oppo Reno 13 Series Launched In India: Price, Features - News18
item.description:
Oppo Reno 13 Series Launched In India: Price, Features

Date: January 13, 2025

Source: News18

Oppo has officially launched the Reno 13 and Reno 13 Pro 5G models in India, aimed primarily at camera enthusiasts. These devices were unveiled in China a few months ago and have received some design tweaks tailored for the Indian market.

Key Points:

  • Reno 13 5G starts at Rs 37,999 for 8+128GB and Rs 39,999 for 8+256GB versions.
  • Reno 13 Pro 5G starts at Rs 49,999 for 12+256 GB and Rs 54,999 for 12+512GB options.
  • Both models are powered by MediaTek Dimensity chipsets and run on Android 15.
  • The basic Reno 13 features a dual camera setup with a 50MP main sensor and 50MP front camera.
  • The Reno 13 Pro has a triple camera setup, including a 50MP main sensor and a 50MP telephoto sensor.
  • Both models offer significant battery life with fast charging support.
“The premium version gets a 5,800 mAh battery that supports 80W charging speed.”

The launch of the Oppo Reno 13 series emphasizes the brand's commitment to improving photographic capabilities and overall user experience in the mid-range smartphone segment.

item.title: iOS 18.3 Update Coming Soon For iPhone Users: What You Can Expect - News18
item.description:
iOS 18.3 Update Coming Soon For iPhone Users: What You Can Expect

Date: January 13, 2025 | Source: News18

Apple is set to release the iOS 18.3 update for iPhone users later this month, following the bug-fixing iOS 18.2.1 update. Users are eagerly anticipating the new AI features with this update.

Key Points:

  • The iOS 18.3 beta is currently in its second stage.
  • A potential new Invites app has been spotted in the beta code, which might assist in organizing events and meetings.
  • Further details about the features in the upcoming public release are expected soon.
  • Siri's AI capabilities are anticipated to be a significant focus in this update.

"The Siri AI integration still feels half baked... we might see some glimpses of that with the iOS 18.3 and the iPadOS 18.3 versions."

The iOS 18.3 update is being awaited by users looking for new features and improvements, especially in AI functionalities.

item.title: Garena Free Fire MAX Redeem Codes Today January 13, 2025: Grab Kakashi Bundle, Naruto Emote – Ninja Run, Clone Jutsu And… - News24
item.description:
Garena Free Fire MAX Redeem Codes Today January 13, 2025

Date: January 13, 2025 Source: News24

Introduction

Garena Free Fire MAX is an enhanced version of the classic battle royale game that offers players improved graphics, gameplay, and new features. Today, several redeem codes are available for players to claim exciting rewards.

Steps to Redeem Garena Free Fire MAX Redeem Codes

  • Log on to the official website – Garena Reward
  • Use your Facebook, Google, Twitter, or VK IDs to log in
  • Copy and paste the redeem codes into the text box
  • Click on the confirm button to continue
  • A dialogue box will pop up to cross-check. Click ‘OK’
  • After successfully redeeming the codes, collect your reward in the in-game mail section

Available Redeem Codes

  • FFKSY7PQNWHG – Kakashi Bundle
  • FF4MTXQPFDZ9 – Poker MP40 Ring
  • FFSP9XQ2TNZK – Super Emote – Gamabunta Summoning
  • FFSUTXVQF2NR – Sasuke (Without Katana) Special Gold Royale Bundle + Rasegan Emote
  • FFNRWTQPFDZ9 – Naruto Ascension + Rasengan + Gloo Wall – Hokage Rock + Loot Box – Body Substitution
  • FFMGY7TPWNV2 – Naruto Emote – Ninja Run, Clone Jutsu
  • FFMSTXP2FWCK – Mystery Shop – Sakura Bundle, Grand Slam Bundle
  • FFXT7SW9KG2M – 1875 Diamonds
  • NPFT7FKPCXNQ – M1887 One Punch Man Skin
  • ... [additional codes as listed in the original article]

Important Note For Players

Players must link their game accounts to one of the supported platforms to redeem these codes. The codes are valid for a limited time only (24 hours) and can be used once.

Conclusion

Garena Free Fire MAX offers exciting opportunities for players to enhance their gaming experience with special redeem codes. Make sure to redeem them promptly to enjoy exclusive in-game rewards.

item.title: DBS Bank’s marketing playbook: Purpose-driven storytelling and the future of financial branding | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
DBS Bank’s Marketing Playbook: Purpose-Driven Storytelling and the Future of Financial Branding

Publication Date: [Date Not Provided] Source: Company Business News

In a competitive financial landscape, DBS Bank embraces a unique storytelling strategy to enhance its brand identity. The bank's approach is aimed at digital transformation, sustainability, and engaging younger audiences.

  • DBS Bank has been rated the most valuable bank brand in ASEAN for 18 consecutive years.
  • The bank is shifting from traditional marketing to a purpose-led strategy.
  • Key areas of focus include digital tools and responsible artificial intelligence.
  • Engagement with younger audiences through innovative content is a priority.
"We are building a purpose-driven brand by embracing digital transformation." - Karen Ngui, MD of DBS Foundation.

The article reveals how DBS Bank is redefining its marketing strategy to strengthen its brand through meaningful storytelling and engagement with its audience.

item.title: Here's when it's worth paying $2,000 for the RTX 5090 - XDA Developers
item.description:
Here's when it's worth paying $2,000 for the RTX 5090

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: XDA Developers

Investing in the RTX 5090 might seem extravagant for a single graphics card, but there are situations where it makes sense, especially for those who demand the best gaming and AI performance.

  • The RTX 5090 is priced at $2,000, highlighting its premium positioning in the market.
  • Considering alternatives like the RTX 5070 or even the RTX 4090 may not satisfy those seeking exceptional performance.
  • Gamers and professionals focusing on AI applications may find the RTX 5090's features worthwhile.
  • The card offers significant upgrades, including an additional 8GB of VRAM over the RTX 4090.
“The RTX 5090 offers substantial improvements for professionals working with AI and data-intensive applications.”

Ultimately, for dedicated gamers and professionals requiring cutting-edge technology, the RTX 5090 could be a justified investment despite its high cost.

item.title: Amazon Great Republic Day Sale 2025 Goes Live for Prime Members: Best Deals on Mobiles, Electronics - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Amazon Great Republic Day Sale 2025 Is Live: Best Deals

Publication Date: January 13, 2025

Source: Gadgets 360

Amazon Great Republic Day Sale 2025 is live for Prime members, with deals opening to all from 12pm on January 13, 2025. The sale features discounts on popular electronics including mobile phones, laptops, and Amazon devices.

  • iPhone 15 (128GB) for Rs. 55,499 after bank offers.
  • Samsung Galaxy M35 5G down to Rs. 13,999 after bank offers.
  • Oppo F27 Pro+ 5G available for Rs. 23,400 with exchange offers.
  • Best offers on Amazon devices like Fire TV Stick starting at Rs. 2,799.
  • Lenovo IdeaPad Pro 5 priced at Rs. 1,03,990 during the sale.
“Amazon is offering exciting discounts and bundled offers – SBI credit card users can get an additional 10% off.”

The Amazon Great Republic Day Sale 2025 provides substantial savings on a range of electronic products, with special offers for Prime members and various exchange deals.

item.title: Samsung to rely on AI to boost its global market growth - Android Headlines
item.description:
Samsung to Rely on AI for Global Market Growth

Publication Date: January 7, 2025 Source: CNBC

Samsung is implementing artificial intelligence in its products to boost market growth following disappointing financial results in 2024. AI features in the Galaxy devices aim to enhance user experience amidst strong competition from Chinese brands.

  • Samsung plans to continue integrating AI across various product lines.
  • The company aims to improve market competitiveness against Chinese brands like Xiaomi.
  • AI-driven features to be highlighted in the upcoming Galaxy S25 devices.
  • Samsung’s semiconductor division is also focused on the AI industry as a key hardware supplier.
  • Financial challenges led to a significant drop in Samsung's share prices in 2024.
“Competition from Chinese companies is helpful for both Samsung and its users.” - Han Jong-hee, CEO of Samsung Electronics

Samsung is betting on AI to drive market growth, with plans to reveal strategies gradually to increase shareholder returns.

item.title: AMD’s Radeon RX 9070 XT Graphics Card Specs, Performance, Price & Availability – Everything We Know So Far - Wccftech
item.description:
AMD's Radeon RX 9070 XT Graphics Card Specs, Performance, Price & Availability

Publication Date: January 7, 2025
Source: Wccftech

AMD's upcoming Radeon RX 9070 XT aims to revolutionize the mainstream GPU market with exceptional price-to-performance characteristics. Despite not presenting detailed specs at CES 2025, rumors and insider statements suggest a strong competitive stance against NVIDIA's offerings.

  • The RX 9070 XT will feature a Navi 48 die, utilizing 16 GB GDDR6 memory.
  • Power consumption is set at 330W, with boost clocks around 3060 MHz.
  • AMD shifts focus from high-end market competition to value-driven performance.
  • The GPU has performed well in early benchmarks, rivaling NVIDIA's 70 and 80-class GPUs.
  • Pre-orders for the RX 9070 XT begin on January 23rd, 2025.
"AMD has managed to keep details under wraps for its RDNA 4 SKUs, which is why we are currently unaware of the extensive specifications of the Radeon RX 9070 XT. However, most of the important details have surfaced."

This shift in AMD’s strategy could transform the gaming experience, especially for 2K and 4K gaming scenarios. The company aims to price the RX 9070 XT between $600 and $800, competing directly with NVIDIA's offerings.

item.title: Itel Zeno 10 with a 6.6-inch screen, 5,000mAh battery launched in India: Price, specifications - Moneycontrol
item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.

item.title: First phase of Bima Sugam project likely to be rolled out mid-2025 - Business Standard
item.description:
First phase of Bima Sugam project likely to be rolled out mid-2025

Date: Jan 12 2025 | Source: Business Standard

The Bima Sugam project aims to create a one-stop digital platform for insurance in India, and is expected to launch in mid-2025 after several delays.

  • The project was initially proposed for a January 2023 launch.
  • It aims to democratize insurance in India and could be the first of its kind globally.
  • Insurance Regulatory and Development Authority of India (Irdai) chairman Debasish Panda announced a potential rollout in April 2025.
  • There have been multiple missed deadlines since its initial announcement in 2022.
The platform’s aim is to democratise insurance in India, potentially becoming the first of its kind globally.

The rollout of the Bima Sugam project is crucial for enhancing access to insurance services in India and represents a significant step toward digital transformation in the insurance sector.

item.title: Apple may add an iPhone Air to its lineup - TechCrunch
item.description:
Apple may add an iPhone Air to its lineup

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 | Source: TechCrunch

Apple's next major iPhone upgrade will introduce a new model called the iPhone 17 Air, possibly aimed at expanding its lineup.

  • The iPhone 17 Air is expected to be thinner than current models, featuring Apple’s first in-house modem.
  • This new model reflects Apple's successful use of the 'Air' moniker for its MacBooks and iPads.
  • Mark Gurman reports that the phone will be two millimeters thinner than existing iPhones.
  • The introduction of the iPhone Air could hint at future developments, including foldable devices.
  • Other expected Apple products for 2025 include a smart home hub.
“This seems like an obvious way to expand the lineup, given Apple’s success with the Air moniker.” - Mark Gurman

The anticipated launch of the iPhone Air represents a strategic move by Apple to attract consumers looking for a thinner smartphone while hinting at future innovations.

item.title: Field agents at a crossroads: The BC channel is ripe for being reimagined - Business Standard
item.description:
Field agents at a crossroads: The BC channel is ripe for being reimagined

Date: January 12, 2025 | Source: Business Standard

This article discusses the Business Correspondent Resource Council's proposal to allow field agents to sell insurance products, highlighting the necessity of enhancing the financial viability of this channel.

  • The BCRC's pitch to allow field agents to market insurance products to improve financial sustainability.
  • The initiative is part of Irdai's push for the Bima Trinity: Bima Vistaar, Bima Vaahaks, and Bima Sugam.
  • Field agents play a vital role in providing banking access in remote areas.
“BCs remain relevant in providing banking access in remote areas.”

This initiative signifies a broader movement to enhance the services offered by field agents and drive financial inclusion.

item.title: OnePlus Open 2 to be a big upgrade over its predecessor, expected this spring - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
item.description:
OnePlus Open 2 to be a big upgrade over its predecessor, expected this spring

Publication Date: Not specified   |   Source: Weibo

The upcoming OnePlus Open 2 is expected to feature significant upgrades over its predecessor, including a durable design and enhanced specifications.

  • Potential rebranding of Oppo Find N5 for global market.
  • Sturdy design improvements with titanium materials.
  • Will likely be the thinnest foldable device available.
  • Improved triple-camera system developed with Hasselblad.
  • Powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC and equipped with around 6,000 mAh battery.
  • Features wireless charging and satellite communication support.
  • Expected release between March and June 2024.
“The OnePlus Open 2's global release is scheduled right before Samsung and Google's foldables.”

This significant upgrade from OnePlus indicates the company's focus on competing in the evolving foldable smartphone market.

item.title: Apple Arcade expands with 10 new games, including first official PGA Tour title - The Times of India
item.description:
Apple Arcade Expands with 10 New Games, Including First Official PGA Tour Title

Publication Date: N/A Source: N/A

Apple Arcade is launching 10 new games in early 2025, headlined by the first officially licensed professional golf game, PGA TOUR Pro Golf.

  • PGA TOUR Pro Golf arrives on February 6, featuring authentic courses and tournament play.
  • Seven new titles are released today; three more are scheduled for early February.
  • Other games include Skate City: New York and a tower defense game, Gears & Goo.
  • Existing games are receiving updates, such as the Lunar New Year event in Hello Kitty Island Adventure.
  • The subscription service costs INR 99 per month and allows access to over 200 games.
“All Arcade Originals are playable across Apple's device ecosystem, including the upcoming Vision Pro.”

This expansion signifies Apple's commitment to enriching the gaming experience on its platforms, catering to diverse gaming preferences.

item.title: What time is SpaceX's Starship Flight 7 launch test on Jan. 15? - Space.com
item.description:
What time is SpaceX's Starship Flight 7 launch test on Jan. 15?

Date: January 15, 2025 | Source: Space.com

SpaceX is preparing for the launch of its Starship Flight 7 on January 15, 2025. This launch will test a new version of the world's largest rocket with significant upgrades.

  • The launch is scheduled for 5 p.m. EST (2200 GMT) from the Starbase facility in South Texas.
  • SpaceX is targeting to catch the Super Heavy booster at the launch site, similar to a previous successful attempt.
  • Viewers can watch the launch live on Space.com and other platforms starting 30 minutes before launch.
  • If the weather or technical issues prevent the launch, backup days are available for January 14 and 15.
"Excitement Guaranteed," says SpaceX regarding the launch.

The upcoming Starship Flight 7 is pivotal as it showcases advancements in technology and aims for new records in space exploration.

item.title: The iPhone Air could be coming later this year - The Verge
item.description:
Apple Expected to Release iPhone 17 Air This Fall

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 Source: Bloomberg

The upcoming iPhone 17 Air is anticipated to be a thin, innovative device that will serve as a testing ground for Apple’s future technologies, including foldable devices. The new model is expected to be significantly slimmer than previous iPhones.

  • The iPhone 17 Air will reportedly be about 2 millimeters thinner than existing models.
  • It may feature a 6.6-inch ProMotion OLED display and a single 48-megapixel camera.
  • Expected to be powered by the A19 chip and packed with 8GB of RAM.
  • Rumored to debut new Apple-designed Wi-Fi and Bluetooth chips.
“The thinness isn’t just a flex — realizing it will help Apple along toward future foldable iPads and iPhones.” - Mark Gurman

In conclusion, the iPhone 17 Air could reshape Apple’s future product lines by testing new technologies in a slim design, preparing the ground for foldables.

item.title: How to turn off Apple Intelligence on your iPhone - The Verge
item.description:
How to Disable Apple Intelligence on Your iPhone

Publication Date: October 28, 2024

Source: The Verge

This article discusses how to disable Apple Intelligence features on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac, providing step-by-step instructions for users who find these AI features unnecessary or intrusive. It highlights that many users do not see value in these features and offers alternatives to disable them.

  • Apple Intelligence is now available on iPhones, iPads, and Macs.
  • About 75% of iPhone users find little value in Apple Intelligence.
  • The intelligence features take up approximately 7GB of local storage.
  • Users can disable specific features easily through Settings.
  • Disabling Apple Intelligence completely requires resetting the device if storage needs to be freed.
"If you really don’t want anything to do with Apple Intelligence, and you’ve already enabled it, you can turn it off completely."

While Apple Intelligence features can often be disabled individually, users have the option to completely turn them off through Settings, making it a manageable aspect of user experience on Apple devices.

item.title: Parliamentary panel reviews price spike of medicines | Today News - Mint
item.description:
Parliamentary panel reviews price spike of medicines

Date: 7 January | Source: Today News

The Parliamentary Standing Committee on Chemicals and Fertilizers met to discuss the rising prices of essential medicines, with a goal to potentially lower the cost of life-saving drugs.

  • The meeting was attended by officials from the Department of Pharmaceuticals (DoP).
  • The primary focus was on essential medicines and their pricing strategies.
  • The committee aims to address issues concerning price spikes in the pharmaceutical sector.
“This move may lead to a lowering of prices of life-saving medicines.”

In summary, the review of medicine prices by the parliamentary panel highlights a proactive approach towards ensuring affordable access to essential healthcare.

item.title: iPhone 13 price drops on Flipkart - India Today
item.description:
iPhone 13 Price Drops on Flipkart

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: India Today

The iPhone 13 has received a significant price reduction on Flipkart, making it an attractive option for budget-conscious buyers. The device is now listed at approximately Rs 45,399 with possible further discounts through exchange and payment options.

  • The iPhone 13 is available on Flipkart for around Rs 45,399.
  • The official retail price is Rs 49,900, offering a flat discount of Rs 4,501.
  • Additional discounts up to Rs 1,000 are available via UPI and bank card offers.
  • Exchange offers can reduce prices further, potentially providing up to Rs 28,500 off based on the age and condition of your old device.
  • The iPhone 13 is powered by the A15 Bionic chip, ensuring reliable performance.
  • It receives iOS updates regularly, enhancing its longevity and access to new features.
  • The dual-camera system offers impressive image quality for its price range.
  • It balances performance and usability for those seeking a premium smartphone experience.
“For those seeking a premium smartphone experience without breaking the bank, the iPhone 13 offers a good balance between performance, camera quality, and overall usability.”

This price drop on the iPhone 13 at Flipkart presents a compelling opportunity for consumers looking to upgrade without exceeding their budgets.

item.title: Apple iPhone SE 4 Might Boast OLED Display & Be Powered By A18 Chip - ABP Live
item.description:
Apple iPhone SE 4 Might Boast OLED Display & Be Powered By A18 Chip

Publication Date: January 2023, Source: Tech News

The fourth-generation iPhone SE, possibly branded as iPhone 16e, is set to launch soon with a focus on affordability and updated specifications.

  • Expected to feature a 6.06-inch full-HD+ LTPS OLED display with a 60Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by Apple’s A18 Bionic chip.
  • Includes a 48-megapixel rear camera.
  • Face ID support and a durable, waterproof design are anticipated.
  • Pricing expected to be under $500.
“The device marks a significant step toward reducing Apple's reliance on third-party suppliers for cellular technology.” - Smart Pikachu

With its budget-friendly approach and advanced specs, the iPhone SE 4 is poised to be a strong contender in the smartphone market.

item.title: The OnePlus Open 2 tipped to be the thinnest foldable yet – with a new titanium build - TechRadar
item.description:
The OnePlus Open 2 tipped to be the thinnest foldable yet – with a new titanium build

Date: [Insert publication date] | Source: TechRadar

The OnePlus Open 2 is set to launch soon, boasting a thinner and tougher design with a titanium build, aiming to be the slimmest foldable phone available.

  • The OnePlus Open 2 could be arriving imminently.
  • A tougher, lighter, thinner build is rumored.
  • The Honor Magic V3 is currently the thinnest foldable.
"The OnePlus Open 2 will have to be less than the 9.2 mm thickness of the Honor Magic V3 when closed."

In conclusion, anticipation builds around the OnePlus Open 2 as it promises significant advancements in design and capabilities compared to its predecessor.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 series launching soon with new colour options - India Today
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Launching Soon with New Colour Options

Publication Date: January 2025 Source: India Today

Samsung is set to unveil its flagship Galaxy S25 series on January 22, featuring various leaks revealing new color options and specifications.

  • The S25 and S25+ will be available in Iceblue, Mint, Navy, and Silver Shadow.
  • The S25 Ultra will come in Titanium Black, Titanium Gray, Titanium Silver Blue, and Titanium White Silver.
  • All models are expected to feature flat frames and rounded edges.
  • The Galaxy S25 is rumored to include Snapdragon 8 Elite processors and up to 16GB of RAM in select markets.
  • Press coverage anticipates the S25 Ultra will boast advanced camera capabilities with a 200MP main sensor.
  • There may be a fourth model named Galaxy S25 Slim announced during the launch.
"The Galaxy S25 will be the most compact model, while the S25 Ultra is expected to offer the most powerful camera capabilities in the series."

The Samsung Galaxy S25 series is generating significant buzz, with enthusiasts eagerly awaiting its official launch and detailed features.

item.title: NCLT Hearing Hack: A Wake-Up Call to Bolster Courts' Cybersecurity | Today News - Mint
item.description:
NCLT Hearing Hack: A Wake-Up Call to Bolster Courts' Cybersecurity

Published on: December 2023 | Source: Today News

The National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT) in Mumbai has temporarily suspended virtual hearings, requiring lawyers to appear physically after its virtual hearing system was hacked on 12 and 17 December.

  • Unidentified hackers disrupted proceedings by broadcasting pornographic content.
  • Legal and cyber law experts warn about the vulnerability of Indian courts to such cyberattacks.
  • There is a growing consensus on the need to strengthen digital infrastructure to ensure accessible justice.
"This incident highlights the critical need for enhanced cybersecurity measures in our legal system." - Cyber Law Expert

In conclusion, the recent hack of the NCLT's virtual hearing system serves as a significant reminder of the vulnerabilities present in digital court systems and the urgent need for improved cybersecurity measures to protect the integrity of judicial proceedings.

item.title: Department of hate: Why employees like to dislike HR | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Department of Hate: Why Employees Dislike HR

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Mint

This article reflects on the challenges and perceptions employees have towards human resources departments, highlighted by a question raised by an employee regarding the lack of diversity in senior management.

  • Amitabh K., a marketing executive, questions the absence of non-white individuals in senior management.
  • The employee's concerns emphasize a disparity between the diverse workforce and the leadership.
“Where are the non-whites in the senior management team?”

The article sheds light on the complex relationship employees have with HR, often being seen as a department filled with policies that employees may not agree with or understand. It serves as a commentary on the need for HR departments to improve communication and representation.

item.title: Deals: OnePlus 13 launches, Poco X7 and X7 Pro arrive in Europe as well - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
item.description:
OnePlus 13 Launches Globally Alongside Poco X7 and X7 Pro in Europe

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: GSM Arena

The OnePlus 13 has officially launched with a pricing strategy aimed to attract previous OnePlus 12 buyers, while the Poco X7 series has also been introduced in the UK, featuring two models distinguished by performance and battery specifications.

  • The OnePlus 13 comes with a €100 discount for the 16/512GB model, aligning its price with last year's OnePlus 12.
  • The Poco X7 and X7 Pro both feature 6.67” 120Hz OLED displays, with significant differences in battery capacity and performance chipsets.
  • The Poco X7 Pro is equipped with the Dimensity 8400 Ultra, while the standard X7 offers the Dimensity 7300 Ultra.
  • Batteries range from 5,110mAh in the standard model to 6,000mAh in the Pro, with HyperCharge support for fast charging.
  • Both models feature similar camera setups, though the recording capabilities differ due to chipset variations.
“We may get a commission from qualifying sales.”

This new launch strategy by OnePlus and Xiaomi reflects their approach to enhancing market penetration in Europe by offering competitive pricing and technologically advanced features.

item.title: Amazon Republic Day Sale 2025: iPhone 15 to get 18% price cut, big discounts on the Galaxy S23 Ultra, and more | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Amazon Republic Day Sale 2025: iPhone 15 to get 18% Price Cut, Big Discounts on the Galaxy S23 Ultra, and More

Date: January 13, 2025
Source: Live Mint

The Amazon Great Republic Day Sale is set to start on January 13 at noon, with Prime members enjoying early access. Several notable smartphone deals have already been previewed.

  • The iPhone 15 will be on sale for ₹56,999, which is a great opportunity for those who missed previous sales.
  • The iQOO 13, featuring the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, will be an affordable option for performance enthusiasts.
  • The Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra will be available for under ₹70,000, offering premium features and performance.
  • Mid-range smartphone lovers can look forward to discounts on the OnePlus Nord 4.
  • The Xiaomi 14 will also be discounted, providing a premium camera experience at an affordable price.
"What sets the S23 Ultra apart is its curved screen, which many users miss on the S24 Ultra."

This sale represents a significant opportunity for consumers to purchase high-end smartphones at reduced prices.
